discord.1: Role Mapping from Discord to WordPress
discord.2: Managing guild members from WordPress (add, delete, update)
discord.3: Role Mapping from WordPress to Discord
discord.4: Handling subscription based access to the discord channels from WordPress
discord.5: Discord Avatar Mapping to WordPress profile picture

whmcs.1: Auto populate some user fields at WooCommerce checkout
whmcs.2: Login into WHMCS using WordPress credentials

cognito.1: Register User in Amazon Cognito pools from the WordPress website
cognito.2: Login users into WordPress without redirecting them to Cognito
cognito.4: Create and verify users via OTP in Cognito at the woocommerce checkout page
cognito.5: From website, update or delete users to Cognito user pool

azure.2: User Registration in Azure AD at WooCommerce checkout
azure.3: Provision/Sync users from WordPress to Azure AD (On the fly user provisioning)
azure.4: Restrict WP pages and posts based on Azure user groups

azureb2c.1: User Registration in Azure B2C at WooCommerce checkout
azureb2c.2: Synchronize your users and groups from Azure B2C to WordPress & vice versa
azureb2c.3: Display your complete Azure B2C users directory in the WordPress along with profile pictures

salesforce.1: Entire website access based on user Salesforce badge
salesforce.2: Website content restriction based on Salesforce badge

keycloak.1: Logout user from Keycloak after loging out from Wordpress & vice versa

clever.1: Learndash courses access based on SSO user's school section
clever.2: Website content restriction based on SSO user roles like student, teacher, parent, district admin

classlink.1: Learndash courses access based on SSO user's school section
classlink.2: Website content restriction based on SSO user roles like student, teacher, parent, district admin

office365.1: User Registration in Azure at WooCommerce checkout
office365.2: Synchronize your users and groups from Office 365 to WordPress & vice versa
office365.3: Enable seamless integration with Office 365 apps like Dynamic CRM, Power Apps, Outlook, Calendar

okta.1: Email domain restriction to access the website
okta.2: Website content restriction based on Okta groups

hubspot.1: Single Sign-On into Hubspot with any IDP
hubspot.2: Synchronize your users from Hubspot to WordPress & vice versa
